FROM alpine:3.7
MAINTAINER Alberto Rafael Rodr√≠guez Iglesias <albertocysec@gmail.com / alberto.iglesias@owasp.org>
RUN apk update --no-cache && apk add --no-cache python3 \
python3-dev \
py3-pip \
git \
bash

RUN git clone https://github.com/blabla1337/skf-labs.git
WORKDIR /skf-labs/CMD-Blind
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt
CMD [ "python3", "./CMD-Blind.py" ]
